short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A an extension for automating simple proxy systems like ezproxy (not affliated)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automates simple web proxies like ezproxy. Instead of needing to alter the url this extension will automatically redirect any page with a url containing a user defined keyword to the proxy service. The proxy service is also user specified. This is not affiliated with ezproxy it is just helpful for using it.
